desc: Busy Hands Quilts sells patterns for modern and traditional quilters & heirloom keepsake quilts. Quilt patterns include as many sizes as possible, using precuts and strip piecing when they apply. Easy-to-read charts and illustrations, along with well-written instructions make Busy Hands Quilts patterns a great value.

layout.text: Quilt Pattern in stock | Includes 5 Sizes | Fat Quarter Friendly
